UPDATE tcim_feedetail
biz_id = #{bizId},
bill_id = #{billId},
investor_id = #{investorId},
profit_cfplanner_id = #{profitCfplannerId},
origin_cfplanner_id = #{originCfplannerId},
product_org_id = #{productOrgId},
product_id = #{productId},
product_amount = #{productAmount},
yearpur_amount = #{yearpurAmount},
remark = #{remark},
fee_rate = #{feeRate},
fee_amount = #{feeAmount},
fee_type = #{feeType},
balance_status = #{balanceStatus},
balance_number = #{balanceNumber},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
id = #{id}

UPDATE tcim_feedetail
biz_id = #{bizId},
bill_id = #{billId},
investor_id = #{investorId},
profit_cfplanner_id = #{profitCfplannerId},
origin_cfplanner_id = #{originCfplannerId},
product_org_id = #{productOrgId},
product_id = #{productId},
product_amount = #{productAmount},
yearpur_amount = #{yearpurAmount},
remark = #{remark},
fee_rate = #{feeRate},
fee_amount = #{feeAmount},
fee_type = #{feeType},
balance_status = #{balanceStatus},
balance_number = #{balanceNumber},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
id = #{0}
mapper.select: select IFNULL(SUM(case when DATE_FORMAT(t.create_time,'%Y-%m')=DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m') then t.fee_amount else 0 end),0) monthProfit, IFNULL(SUM(case when DATE_FORMAT(t.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')=DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d') then t.fee_amount else 0 end),0) todayProfit, IFNULL(SUM(t.fee_amount),0) historyProfit, IFNULL(SUM(case when t.fee_type = '1001' and DATE_FORMAT(t.create_time,'%Y-%m')=DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m') then t.fee_amount else 0 end),0) feeProfit, IFNULL(SUM(case when t.fee_type = '1002' and DATE_FORMAT(t.create_time,'%Y-%m')=DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m') then t.fee_amount else 0 end),0) recommendProfit from tcim_fee t where t.profit_cfplanner_id = #{userId}
mapper.update:
update tcim_feedetail set balance_status=#{balanceStatus},
balance_number = (CASE profit_cfplanner_id
when '${item.userId}' then '${item.balanceNumber}'
END),
update_time=NOW() WHERE create_time BETWEEN #{beginTime} AND #{endTime} AND profit_cfplanner_id
#{cfplannerId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN f.fee_amount>0 AND f.fee_amount<=50 THEN 1 ELSE null END) lev1, COUNT(CASE WHEN f.fee_amount>50 AND f.fee_amount<=200 THEN 1 ELSE null END) lev2, COUNT(CASE WHEN f.fee_amount>200 AND f.fee_amount<=500 THEN 1 ELSE null END) lev3, COUNT(CASE WHEN f.fee_amount>500 AND f.fee_amount<=1000 THEN 1 ELSE null END) lev4, COUNT(CASE WHEN f.fee_amount>1000 AND f.fee_amount<=5000 THEN 1 ELSE null END) lev5, COUNT(CASE WHEN f.fee_amount>5000 AND f.fee_amount<=10000 THEN 1 ELSE null END) lev6, COUNT(CASE WHEN f.fee_amount>10000 AND f.fee_amount<=50000 THEN 1 ELSE null END) lev7, COUNT(CASE WHEN f.fee_amount>50000 THEN 1 ELSE null END) lev8 FROM ( SELECT SUM(f.fee_amount) fee_amount, f.profit_cfplanner_id FROM tcim_fee f where f.fee_amount>0 GROUP BY f.profit_cfplanner_id )f

SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN f.fee_amount>0 AND f.fee_amount<=50 THEN 1 ELSE null END) lev1, COUNT(CASE WHEN f.fee_amount>50 AND f.fee_amount<=200 THEN 1 ELSE null END) lev2, COUNT(CASE WHEN f.fee_amount>200 AND f.fee_amount<=500 THEN 1 ELSE null END) lev3, COUNT(CASE WHEN f.fee_amount>500 AND f.fee_amount<=1000 THEN 1 ELSE null END) lev4, COUNT(CASE WHEN f.fee_amount>1000 AND f.fee_amount<=5000 THEN 1 ELSE null END) lev5, COUNT(CASE WHEN f.fee_amount>5000 AND f.fee_amount<=10000 THEN 1 ELSE null END) lev6, COUNT(CASE WHEN f.fee_amount>10000 AND f.fee_amount<=50000 THEN 1 ELSE null END) lev7, COUNT(CASE WHEN f.fee_amount>50000 THEN 1 ELSE null END) lev8, f.showdate FROM (SELECT SUM(f.fee_amount) fee_amount, f.showdate FROM
( SELECT f.fee_amount,
DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y年第%u周') showdate,
DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y年第%m月') showdate,
f.profit_cfplanner_id FROM tcim_fee f WHERE f.create_time BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} AND f.fee_amount>0
AND f.product_org_id=#{org}
)f GROUP BY f.showdate,f.profit_cfplanner_id)f GROUP BY f.showdate
